<pre class="prettyprint lang-wiki"><table id="src_table_0"><tr
id=sl_svn257_1

 onmouseover="gutterOver(1)"

><td class="source">#summary How to implement the Login UseCase<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_2

 onmouseover="gutterOver(2)"

><td class="source"><br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_3

 onmouseover="gutterOver(3)"

><td class="source">= Introduction =<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_4

 onmouseover="gutterOver(4)"

><td class="source"><br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_5

 onmouseover="gutterOver(5)"

><td class="source">Suppose we are building an application that requires users to authenticate using the standard login/password request. Typically, you have some kind of a UseCase specification that describes the steps and explains the happy flow. Clearly, there will be an interaction sequence (conversation) between the user, the application and some authentication service.<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_6

 onmouseover="gutterOver(6)"

><td class="source"><br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_7

 onmouseover="gutterOver(7)"

><td class="source">== Details ==<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_8

 onmouseover="gutterOver(8)"

><td class="source"><br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_9

 onmouseover="gutterOver(9)"

><td class="source">  # The main application (View) will start the conversation *Login* and tell the conversation *Login* to report to the main application when login was succesfull.<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_10

 onmouseover="gutterOver(10)"

><td class="source">  # The conversation will inspect the Context whether credentials (username, password) are available. <br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_11

 onmouseover="gutterOver(11)"

><td class="source">  # If not, the conversation *Login* will show an input dialog requesting the user to provide this information. <br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_12

 onmouseover="gutterOver(12)"

><td class="source">  # After accepting the input to this dialog, the conversation *Login* will send the login command request using an application server (through a !UserController). The Client will send the request and receive the response and report to the conversation *Login* with the answer (Reply). <br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_13

 onmouseover="gutterOver(13)"

><td class="source">  # The conversation *Login* will store the information (user,logged_in) into the Context and report to the application (View) that the conversation Login is completed. Reporting is done by invoking the handler that was passed when the conversation was started.<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_14

 onmouseover="gutterOver(14)"

><td class="source"><br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_15

 onmouseover="gutterOver(15)"

><td class="source">== Usage ==<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_16

 onmouseover="gutterOver(16)"

><td class="source">To start the Login conversation in the Application component.<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_17

 onmouseover="gutterOver(17)"

><td class="source">{{{<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_18

 onmouseover="gutterOver(18)"

><td class="source">new Login().start(this, handleLoginOk)<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_19

 onmouseover="gutterOver(19)"

><td class="source"><br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_20

 onmouseover="gutterOver(20)"

><td class="source">private function handleLoginOk(cvs:Login):void {<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_21

 onmouseover="gutterOver(21)"

><td class="source">     // now we are logged in<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_22

 onmouseover="gutterOver(22)"

><td class="source">}<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_23

 onmouseover="gutterOver(23)"

><td class="source">}}}<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_24

 onmouseover="gutterOver(24)"

><td class="source"><br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_25

 onmouseover="gutterOver(25)"

><td class="source">== Source Code ==<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_26

 onmouseover="gutterOver(26)"

><td class="source">This implementation is copied from an actual Flex project that uses the *Dunelox* library classes.<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_27

 onmouseover="gutterOver(27)"

><td class="source">{{{<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_28

 onmouseover="gutterOver(28)"

><td class="source">package com.cae.user.usecases<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_29

 onmouseover="gutterOver(29)"

><td class="source">{<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_30

 onmouseover="gutterOver(30)"

><td class="source">	import com.philemonworks.flex.dialogs.LoginDialog;<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_31

 onmouseover="gutterOver(31)"

><td class="source">	import flash.display.DisplayObject;<br></td></tr
><tr

 onmouseover="gutterOver(32)"

><td class="source">	import com.philemonworks.flex.net.Reply;<br></td></tr

 onmouseover="gutterOver(39)"

><td class="source">	<br></td></tr
><tr

><td class="source">	public class Login extends Conversation<br></td></tr
><tr

 onmouseover="gutterOver(41)"

><td class="source">	{<br></td></tr

 onmouseover="gutterOver(42)"

><td class="source">		private var _login:String<br></td></tr

 onmouseover="gutterOver(43)"

 onmouseover="gutterOver(44)"

><td class="source"><br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_45

 onmouseover="gutterOver(45)"

><td class="source">		override protected function begin():void {<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_46

 onmouseover="gutterOver(46)"

><td class="source">			_dialog = LoginDialog.newFor(this.view)<br></td></tr
><tr

 onmouseover="gutterOver(47)"

><td class="source">			_dialog.title = NLS.text(&#39;title.login&#39;)<br></td></tr
><tr

 onmouseover="gutterOver(48)"

><td class="source">			_dialog.show(loginOkHandler)<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_49

 onmouseover="gutterOver(49)"

><td class="source">		}<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_50

 onmouseover="gutterOver(50)"

><td class="source">		private function loginOkHandler(dialog:LoginDialog):void {<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_51

 onmouseover="gutterOver(51)"

><td class="source">			this.tryLogin(dialog.userText.text, dialog.passwordText.text)<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_52

 onmouseover="gutterOver(52)"

><td class="source">		}<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_53

 onmouseover="gutterOver(53)"

><td class="source">		private function tryLogin(user:String,password:String):void {<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_54

 onmouseover="gutterOver(54)"

><td class="source">			_login = user<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_55

 onmouseover="gutterOver(55)"

><td class="source">			LoginController(ApplicationContext.current.get(&quot;LoginController&quot;)).login(user,password,replyHandler)	<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_56

 onmouseover="gutterOver(56)"

><td class="source">		}<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_57

 onmouseover="gutterOver(57)"

><td class="source">		private function replyHandler(reply:Reply):void {<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_58

 onmouseover="gutterOver(58)"

><td class="source">			// always close, creator decides whether to re-open<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_59

 onmouseover="gutterOver(59)"

><td class="source">			if (_dialog != null) _dialog.close()<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_60

 onmouseover="gutterOver(60)"

><td class="source">			if (&quot;denied&quot; == reply.status) {<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_61

 onmouseover="gutterOver(61)"

><td class="source">				MessageDialog.showInformation(<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_62

 onmouseover="gutterOver(62)"

><td class="source">					this.view,<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_63

 onmouseover="gutterOver(63)"

><td class="source">					NLS.expandText(&#39;msg.access.denied&#39;, [_login] ),<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_64

 onmouseover="gutterOver(64)"

><td class="source">					handleOkDialog)	<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_65

 onmouseover="gutterOver(65)"

><td class="source">				ApplicationContext.current.currentLogin = null<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_66

 onmouseover="gutterOver(66)"

><td class="source">				ApplicationContext.current.currentRole = null<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_67

 onmouseover="gutterOver(67)"

><td class="source">				return				<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_68

 onmouseover="gutterOver(68)"

><td class="source">			}<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_69

 onmouseover="gutterOver(69)"

><td class="source">			ApplicationContext.current.currentLogin = _login<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_70

 onmouseover="gutterOver(70)"

><td class="source">			ApplicationContext.current.currentRole = reply.result as String<br></td></tr
><tr

 onmouseover="gutterOver(71)"

><td class="source">			this.end()<br></td></tr
><tr
id=sl_svn257_72

 onmouseover="gutterOver(72)"

><td class="source">		}<br></td></tr
><tr

 onmouseover="gutterOver(73)"

 var lineNumUnderMouse = -1;
 
 function gutterOver(num) {
 gutterOut();
 var newTR = document.getElementById('gr_svn257_' + num);
 if (newTR) {
 newTR.className = 'undermouse';
 }
 lineNumUnderMouse = num;
 }
 function gutterOut() {
 if (lineNumUnderMouse != -1) {
 var oldTR = document.getElementById(
 'gr_svn257_' + lineNumUnderMouse);
 if (oldTR) {
 oldTR.className = '';
 }
 lineNumUnderMouse = -1;
 }
 }
 var numsGenState = {table_base_id: 'nums_table_'};
 var srcGenState = {table_base_id: 'src_table_'};
 var alignerRunning = false;
 var startOver = false;
 function setLineNumberHeights() {
 if (alignerRunning) {
 startOver = true;
 return;
 }
 numsGenState.chunk_id = 0;
 numsGenState.table = document.getElementById('nums_table_0');
 numsGenState.row_num = 0;
 if (!numsGenState.table) {
 return; // Silently exit if no file is present.
 }
 srcGenState.chunk_id = 0;
 srcGenState.table = document.getElementById('src_table_0');
 srcGenState.row_num = 0;
 alignerRunning = true;
 continueToSetLineNumberHeights();
 }
 function rowGenerator(genState) {
 if (genState.row_num < genState.table.rows.length) {
 var currentRow = genState.table.rows[genState.row_num];
 genState.row_num++;
 return currentRow;
 }
 var newTable = document.getElementById(
 genState.table_base_id + (genState.chunk_id + 1));
 if (newTable) {
 genState.chunk_id++;
 genState.row_num = 0;
 genState.table = newTable;
 return genState.table.rows[0];
 }
 return null;
 }
 var MAX_ROWS_PER_PASS = 1000;
 function continueToSetLineNumberHeights() {
 var rowsInThisPass = 0;
 var numRow = 1;
 var srcRow = 1;
 while (numRow && srcRow && rowsInThisPass < MAX_ROWS_PER_PASS) {
 numRow = rowGenerator(numsGenState);
 srcRow = rowGenerator(srcGenState);
 rowsInThisPass++;
 if (numRow && srcRow) {
 if (numRow.offsetHeight != srcRow.offsetHeight) {
 numRow.firstChild.style.height = srcRow.offsetHeight + 'px';
 }
 }
 }
 if (rowsInThisPass >= MAX_ROWS_PER_PASS) {
 setTimeout(continueToSetLineNumberHeights, 10);
 } else {
 alignerRunning = false;
 if (startOver) {
 startOver = false;
 setTimeout(setLineNumberHeights, 500);
 }
 }
 }
 function initLineNumberHeights() {
 // Do 2 complete passes, because there can be races
 // between this code and prettify.
 startOver = true;
 setTimeout(setLineNumberHeights, 250);
 window.onresize = setLineNumberHeights;
 }
 initLineNumberHeights();
</script>

 <script type="text/javascript" src="https://ssl.gstatic.com/codesite/ph/3197964839662303775/js/kibbles.js"></script>
 <script type="text/javascript">
 var lastStop = null;
 var initialized = false;
 
 function updateCursor(next, prev) {
 if (prev && prev.element) {
 prev.element.className = 'cursor_stop cursor_hidden';
 }
 if (next && next.element) {
 next.element.className = 'cursor_stop cursor';
 lastStop = next.index;
 }
 }
 
 function pubRevealed(data) {
 updateCursorForCell(data.cellId, 'cursor_stop cursor_hidden');
 if (initialized) {
 reloadCursors();
 }
 }
 
 function draftRevealed(data) {
 updateCursorForCell(data.cellId, 'cursor_stop cursor_hidden');
 if (initialized) {
 reloadCursors();
 }
 }
 
 function draftDestroyed(data) {
 updateCursorForCell(data.cellId, 'nocursor');
 if (initialized) {
 reloadCursors();
 }
 }
 function reloadCursors() {
 kibbles.skipper.reset();
 loadCursors();
 if (lastStop != null) {
 kibbles.skipper.setCurrentStop(lastStop);
 }
 }
 // possibly the simplest way to insert any newly added comments
 // is to update the class of the corresponding cursor row,
 // then refresh the entire list of rows.
 function updateCursorForCell(cellId, className) {
 var cell = document.getElementById(cellId);
 // we have to go two rows back to find the cursor location
 var row = getPreviousElement(cell.parentNode);
 row.className = className;
 }
 // returns the previous element, ignores text nodes.
 function getPreviousElement(e) {
 var element = e.previousSibling;
 if (element.nodeType == 3) {
 element = element.previousSibling;
 }
 if (element && element.tagName) {
 return element;
 }
 }
 function loadCursors() {
 // register our elements with skipper
 var elements = CR_getElements('*', 'cursor_stop');
 var len = elements.length;
 for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) {
 var element = elements[i]; 
 element.className = 'cursor_stop cursor_hidden';
 kibbles.skipper.append(element);
 }
 }
 function toggleComments() {
 CR_toggleCommentDisplay();
 reloadCursors();
 }
 function keysOnLoadHandler() {
 // setup skipper
 kibbles.skipper.addStopListener(
 kibbles.skipper.LISTENER_TYPE.PRE, updateCursor);
 // Set the 'offset' option to return the middle of the client area
 // an option can be a static value, or a callback
 kibbles.skipper.setOption('padding_top', 50);
 // Set the 'offset' option to return the middle of the client area
 // an option can be a static value, or a callback
 kibbles.skipper.setOption('padding_bottom', 100);
 // Register our keys
 kibbles.skipper.addFwdKey("n");
 kibbles.skipper.addRevKey("p");
 kibbles.keys.addKeyPressListener(
 'u', function() { window.location = detail_url; });
 kibbles.keys.addKeyPressListener(
 'r', function() { window.location = detail_url + '#publish'; });
 
 kibbles.keys.addKeyPressListener('j', gotoNextPage);
 kibbles.keys.addKeyPressListener('k', gotoPreviousPage);
 
 
 kibbles.keys.addKeyPressListener('h', toggleComments);
 
 }
 </script>
